text: The 2019–20 season was FC Augsburg's 121st season in existence. The season lasted from 1 July 2019 to 30 June 2020. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== ===Transfers in=== # Position Player Transferred from Fee Date Source 7 SC Freiburg €2,500,000 17 Hannover 96 €1,700,000 FCA SIGN NOAH SARENREN BAZEE, fcaugsburg.de, 18 June 2019 16 Luzern €2,700,000 22 Internacional €6,500,000 AUGSBURG SIGN BRAZILIAN IAGO, fcaugsburg.de, 23 June 2019 3 FC Nordsjælland €800,000 25 FC Dallas €4,000,000 5 FC Basel Free 36 West Ham United €2,000,000 21 Rennes €7,500,000 2 Arsenal Free ====Loans in==== # Position Player Loaned from Date Loan expires Source 18 Bayer Leverkusen 19 VfL Wolfsburg 29 Hertha BSC ===Transfers out=== # Position Player Transferred to Fee Date Source 22 Mainz 05 Free JI TO LEAVE FCA THIS SUMMER AND JOIN MAINZ, fcaugsburg.de, 6 May 2019 3 1899 Hoffenheim Free 17 SC Freiburg €4,000,000 16 Free Carl Zeiss Jena Undisclosed Gamba Osaka Undisclosed 19 Al-Gharafa Free 36 Eintracht Frankfurt €9,000,000 30 Free ====Loans out==== # Position Player Loaned to Date Loan expires Source 38 Southampton 1860 Munich 11 Schalke 04 3 Zürich ==Pre- season and friendlies== ==Competitions== ===Overview=== ===Bundesliga=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ====Matches==== The Bundesliga schedule was announced on 28 June 2019. ===DFB- Pokal=== ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== |- ! colspan=14 style=background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center| Goalkeepers |- ! colspan=14 style=background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center| Defenders |- ! colspan=14 style=background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center| Midfielders |- ! colspan=14 style=background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center| Forwards |- ! colspan=14 style=background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center| Players transferred out during the season ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:FC Augsburg seasons Category:2019 in association football Category:2020 in European football Category:Football in Germany
